SEARCH
Module com.example.teach
Package com.example.teach.controller

Class ClassInfoController

java.lang.Object
com.example.teach.controller.ClassInfoController
public class ClassInfoController extends Object
Controller for the Class Info view.

Displays detailed blocks for each subject, including teacher assignment and enrolled students, arranged in a grid. Also handles navigation back to the dashboard via injected DashboardController.

  • Method Details

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User u)
      Injects the current User into this controller.

      Called by DashboardController.loadCenter(...) before display.

      Parameters:
      u - the authenticated User

    • setDashboardController

      public void setDashboardController(DashboardController dash)
      Injects the DashboardController to enable drawer toggling and navigation.

      Called by DashboardController.loadCenter(...) before display.

      Parameters:
      dash - the DashboardController instance

    • setSubjects

      public void setSubjects(List<Subject> subs)
      Populates the grid with class info blocks for each subject.

      Must be invoked after setUser(com.example.teach.model.User) and setDashboardController(com.example.teach.controller.DashboardController).

      Parameters:
      subs - list of Subject instances to display
